Hard work should pay off for everyone - whether you‚Äôre on salary, working for tips, or raising children.
¬†
That‚Äôs the Dignity of Work.

It's #WorldPolioDay.
¬†
Before the polio vaccine, more than 15,000 American children were paralyzed every year from polio. Parents lived in fear.
¬†
Now, thanks to a successful mass vaccination program, the U.S. is completely polio-free.
¬†
History is clear ‚Äì vaccines work.

Reality check:

Parents are going back to work ‚Äì not leaving it ‚Äì because of the Child Tax Credit.

When parents can afford child care, they can afford to go back to work.

That's exactly what the Child Tax Credit is doing. https://t.co/SB4LDMemjM

Now, thanks to the American Rescue Plan, Norwalk can use nearly $800,000 in funds to fully replace the line for its residents. https://t.co/HwojMbXtiP

Do you want tax cuts for billionaires and corporations, or do you want tax cuts for working families?

Stock buybacks used to be considered illegal market manipulation. 

Today, they‚Äôre routine.

It's time to tax stock buybacks and make companies think harder about how to reinvest their trillions in profits in workers instead. #StockBuybackAccountabilityAct https://t.co/tjoCsUMATD

It's time to put an end to Wall Street's never-ending cycle of corporate greed at the expense of workers. #StockBuybackAccountabilityAct

The administration must evacuate all Americans and vulnerable Afghan partners immediately. I thank our troops and diplomats risking their lives to stem this humanitarian crisis, and will continue monitoring the events on the ground.

Our hearts are heavy for the victims of the terrorist attack in Kabul - U.S. servicemembers performing a dangerous mission and innocent Afghans fleeing danger. Too many families are afraid for their loved ones‚Äô safety, and for some, today their worst fears have come to pass.
